page.title: 17THE BELL INN, CROSS HOUSES
page.content: {The Bell Inn,}is a{Public House}owned by the{Wem and Shrewsbury Brewery, part of the Greenall Whitley Co. A lorry delivers the stock that has been ordered by telephone by the licencees {Mr.& Mrs. Giblin.}Opening hours are 7-11pm every night and, except for Monday, noon-3pm. The busiest days are Friday and Saturday. Children are not admitted at night and alcohol is not allowed for sale to people under the age of 18. Bitter{beer}costs 76p/pint and mild beer costs 79p/pint (both 3p extra in the Lounge room). Spirits, fizzy and soft drinks as well as sandwiches, pies, crisps and basket meals of chicken, fish, sausage - all with chips, are on sale. There are 2 pub domino teams, 2 pub dart teams, and a pub air rifle shooting team.
